name: The Old Man Who Falls Asleep At Rocking Chair ...
name_original: The Old Man Who Falls Asleep At Rocking Chair ...
description:
The full name of the game is The Old Man Who Falls Asleep At Rocking Chair and Struggles with His Childhood Traumas to Save His Favorite Toys At the Dream. The title explains the story. It's a platform game in which you collect toys and fight enemies from your childhood. Press Z and X for attacking.

Art
Sercan Uysal
Ezgi Erdemir

Programming
Aras Aydoğan
Ahmet Kamil Keleş

Music & SFX
Yamanefe Uğurlu
